footer.description: Automation solutions and workflow optimization specialized in web tools

angkasa.name: Angkasa Automation
angkasa.description: Automated download and upload of reports, misalignment identification, and member repayment transaction insertion for streamlined workflows.

onesignal-subs-scraper.name: OneSignal Subs Scraper
onesignal-subs-scraper.description: Efficiently scrapes OneSignal subscription data per page to reduce manual monitoring and cognitive load for CRM management.

onesignal-domain-inserter.name: OneSignal Domain Inserter
onesignal-domain-inserter.description: Automated domain insertion tool achieving a 0% error rate compared to manual human processes, significantly increasing reliability.

stamplist.name: Stamplist
stamplist.description: High-speed automated loan submission system capable of processing hundreds of submissions in minutes, eliminating scalability bottlenecks.

game-arrangement.name: Game Arrangement
game-arrangement.description: Concurrent automated brand management for game arrangements, reducing processing time by over 80% per brand.

payment-gateway-checker.name: Payment Gateway Checker
payment-gateway-checker.description: Continuous automated testing and status verification for multiple payment gateways, reducing operational expenses and manual oversight.

vip-file-updater.name: VIP File Updater
vip-file-updater.description: Scalable automation for VIP file updates, replacing manual 30-minute updates with an efficient 5-minute automated process.

account-reconcilator.name: Account Reconcilator
account-reconcilator.description: End-to-end automation for retrieving, filtering, and uploading payment gateway documents to Excel for streamlined reconciliation.

manual-banking.name: Manual Banking
manual-banking.description: Automated banking transaction processing from download to summary message, reducing manual data entry time by over 95%.

predictive-dialer-uploader.name: Predictive Dialer List Uploader
predictive-dialer-uploader.description: Streamlined automated listing uploader for predictive dialers, replacing complex manual preparation and repeat upload cycles.

broadcast-dialer-uploader.name: Broadcast Dialer List Uploader
broadcast-dialer-uploader.description: Efficient automated broadcast dialer uploader that handles multiple listings concurrently, solving repetitive workflow constraints.

facebook-comment-scraper.name: Facebook Post Comment Scraper
facebook-comment-scraper.description: Advanced concurrent scraper for Facebook post comments that handles processing and data saving with significantly higher efficiency than manual tasks.

quote.text: Efficiency is doing things right; effectiveness is doing the right things.
quote.author: Peter Drucker

about.title: about-us
description: We are a team of automation specialists focused on streamlining web experiences and professional workflows. We develop responsive tools from scratch and transform them into efficient automated experiences.
Transforming complex tasks into simple, automated knowledge has been our passion. We help clients establish a robust digital presence through cutting-edge technologies and frameworks.
